title: Apple Pudding Cake
directions: Cream butter and sugar. Stir in egg and mix in dry ingredients and apples.
Pour into oiled 9" pan and bake 30 minutes at 350 degrees. Reduce heat to
degrees and bake 20 minutes longer. Serve warm with sauce.
In saucepan mix sugars, cornstarch and salt. Gradually stir in hot water.
Cook until thickened. Stir constantly. Remove from heat and add butter and vanilla. Serve warm.

Per Serving (excluding unknown items): 177 Calories; 6g Fat (31.6% calories from fat); 2g Protein; 29g Carbohydrate; trace Dietary Fiber; 33mg Cholesterol; 216mg Sodium. Exchanges: 1/2 Grain(Starch); 0 Lean Meat; 1 Fat; 1 1/2 Other Carbohydrates.
